titleFormatted.en: Receive metrics for battery [[battery_id]]: charged [[total_charged_kwh]] kWh, discharged [[total_discharged_kwh]] kWh, at [[battery_percentage]]%
titleFormatted.nl: Ontvang metrieken voor batterij [[battery_id]]: geladen [[total_charged_kwh]] kWh, geleverd [[total_discharged_kwh]] kWh, op [[battery_percentage]]%

hint.en: Receives total (cumulative) kWh values from external battery sources like Sessy. The app automatically calculates daily deltas.
hint.nl: Ontvangt totale (cumulatieve) kWh waarden van externe batterijbronnen zoals Sessy. De app berekent automatisch dagelijkse delta's.
